title: Unakoti District Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 04 Medical Officer and Other Posts
description: Unakoti District has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Medical Officers, Nurse, Counsellor, and Data Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, ANM, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the Unakoti District Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the intervi...
